text: Sir Antony Arthur Acland (12 March 1930 - 8 September 2021) was a British diplomat. He was the Provost of Eton College. Acland was the U.K. Ambassador to the United States from 1986 to 1991 during the Margaret Thatcher and John Major ministries.ACLAND, Sir Antony (Arthur), Who's Who 2014, A & C Black, 2014 (online edition, Oxford University Press, 2014) Acland died on 8 September 2021 at the age of 91.Sir Antony Acland, Foreign Office Permanent Under-Secretary and Ambassador to the US who became a favourite of Mrs Thatcher â€“ obituary ==References== ==Other websites== *Sir Antony Acland interviewed by Liz Cox on Monday 23 April 2001 , British Diplomatic Oral History Programme (BDOHP), Churchill College, Cambridge Category:1930 births Category:Ambassadors of the United Kingdom Category:2021 deaths
title: Antony Acland
